scripts.text:
WITH
SQ_PIF_42GQ_LIT_stage AS (
	SELECT
		pif_42gq_lit_stage_id AS PIF_42GQ_LIT_stage_id,
		pif_symbol AS PIF_SYMBOL,
		pif_policy_number AS PIF_POLICY_NUMBER,
		pif_module AS PIF_MODULE,
		ipfcgq_rec_length AS IPFCGQ_REC_LENGTH,
		ipfcgq_action_code AS IPFCGQ_ACTION_CODE,
		ipfcgq_file_id AS IPFCGQ_FILE_ID,
		ipfcgq_segment_id AS IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_ID,
		ipfcgq_segment_level_code AS IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_LEVEL_CODE,
		ipfcgq_segment_part_code AS IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_PART_CODE,
		ipfcgq_sub_part_code AS IPFCGQ_SUB_PART_CODE,
		ipfcgq_year_of_loss AS IPFCGQ_YEAR_OF_LOSS,
		ipfcgq_month_of_loss AS IPFCGQ_MONTH_OF_LOSS,
		ipfcgq_day_of_loss AS IPFCGQ_DAY_OF_LOSS,
		ipfcgq_loss_occurence AS IPFCGQ_LOSS_OCCURENCE,
		ipfcgq_loss_claimant AS IPFCGQ_LOSS_CLAIMANT,
		ipfcgq_claimant_use_code AS IPFCGQ_CLAIMANT_USE_CODE,
		ipfcgq_claimant_use_seq AS IPFCGQ_CLAIMANT_USE_SEQ,
		ipfcgq_year_process AS IPFCGQ_YEAR_PROCESS,
		ipfcgq_month_process AS IPFCGQ_MONTH_PROCESS,
		ipfcgq_day_process AS IPFCGQ_DAY_PROCESS,
		ipfcgq_year_change_entry AS IPFCGQ_YEAR_CHANGE_ENTRY,
		ipfcgq_month_change_entry AS IPFCGQ_MONTH_CHANGE_ENTRY,
		ipfcgq_day_change_entry AS IPFCGQ_DAY_CHANGE_ENTRY,
		ipfcgq_sequence_change_entry AS IPFCGQ_SEQUENCE_CHANGE_ENTRY,
		ipfcgq_segment_status AS IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_STATUS,
		ipfcgq_entry_operator AS IPFCGQ_ENTRY_OPERATOR,
		ipfcgq_reservation_of_rights AS IPFCGQ_RESERVATION_OF_RIGHTS,
		ipfcgq_excess_letter AS IPFCGQ_EXCESS_LETTER,
		ipfcgq_suit_demand AS IPFCGQ_SUIT_DEMAND,
		ipfcgq_suit_offer AS IPFCGQ_SUIT_OFFER,
		ipfcgq_last_offer_date AS IPFCGQ_LAST_OFFER_DATE,
		ipfcgq_trial_date AS IPFCGQ_TRIAL_DATE,
		ipfcgq_suit_status AS IPFCGQ_SUIT_STATUS,
		ipfcgq_suit_date AS IPFCGQ_SUIT_DATE,
		ipfcgq_suit_type AS IPFCGQ_SUIT_TYPE,
		ipfcgq_suit_reason AS IPFCGQ_SUIT_REASON,
		ipfcgq_suit_amount AS IPFCGQ_SUIT_AMOUNT,
		ipfcgq_compensatory_demand AS IPFCGQ_COMPENSATORY_DEMAND,
		ipfcgq_demand_date_1 AS IPFCGQ_DEMAND_DATE_1,
		ipfcgq_compensatory_offer AS IPFCGQ_COMPENSATORY_OFFER,
		ipfcgq_offer_date_1 AS IPFCGQ_OFFER_DATE_1,
		ipfcgq_punitive_demand AS IPFCGQ_PUNITIVE_DEMAND,
		ipfcgq_demand_date_2 AS IPFCGQ_DEMAND_DATE_2,
		ipfcgq_punitive_offer AS IPFCGQ_PUNITIVE_OFFER,
		ipfcgq_offer_date_2 AS IPFCGQ_OFFER_DATE_2,
		ipfcgq_docket_number AS IPFCGQ_DOCKET_NUMBER,
		ipfcgq_suit_state_county AS IPFCGQ_SUIT_STATE_COUNTY,
		ipfcgq_court AS IPFCGQ_COURT,
		ipfcgq_date_papers_served AS IPFCGQ_DATE_PAPERS_SERVED,
		ipfcgq_number_of_part78 AS IPFCGQ_NUMBER_OF_PART78,
		ipfcgq_offset_onset_ind AS IPFCGQ_OFFSET_ONSET_IND,
		ipfcgq_date_hire AS IPFCGQ_DATE_HIRE,
		ipfcgq_pms_future_use_gq AS IPFCGQ_PMS_FUTURE_USE_GQ,
		ipfcgq_direct_reporting AS IPFCGQ_DIRECT_REPORTING,
		ipfcgq_cust_spl_use_gq AS IPFCGQ_CUST_SPL_USE_GQ,
		ipfcgq_yr2000_cust_use AS IPFCGQ_YR2000_CUST_USE,
		inf_action,
		inf_timestamp,
		logical_flag,
		extract_date AS EXTRACT_DATE,
		as_of_date AS AS_OF_DATE,
		record_count AS RECORD_COUNT,
		source_system_id AS SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID
	FROM PIF_42GQ_LIT_stage
),
EXP_arch_PIF_42GQ_LIT_stage AS (
	SELECT
	PIF_42GQ_LIT_stage_id,
	PIF_SYMBOL,
	PIF_POLICY_NUMBER,
	PIF_MODULE,
	IPFCGQ_REC_LENGTH,
	IPFCGQ_ACTION_CODE,
	IPFCGQ_FILE_ID,
	IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_ID,
	IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_LEVEL_CODE,
	IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_PART_CODE,
	IPFCGQ_SUB_PART_CODE,
	IPFCGQ_YEAR_OF_LOSS,
	IPFCGQ_MONTH_OF_LOSS,
	IPFCGQ_DAY_OF_LOSS,
	IPFCGQ_LOSS_OCCURENCE,
	IPFCGQ_LOSS_CLAIMANT,
	IPFCGQ_CLAIMANT_USE_CODE,
	IPFCGQ_CLAIMANT_USE_SEQ,
	IPFCGQ_YEAR_PROCESS,
	IPFCGQ_MONTH_PROCESS,
	IPFCGQ_DAY_PROCESS,
	IPFCGQ_YEAR_CHANGE_ENTRY,
	IPFCGQ_MONTH_CHANGE_ENTRY,
	IPFCGQ_DAY_CHANGE_ENTRY,
	IPFCGQ_SEQUENCE_CHANGE_ENTRY,
	IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_STATUS,
	IPFCGQ_ENTRY_OPERATOR,
	IPFCGQ_RESERVATION_OF_RIGHTS,
	IPFCGQ_EXCESS_LETTER,
	IPFCGQ_SUIT_DEMAND,
	IPFCGQ_SUIT_OFFER,
	IPFCGQ_LAST_OFFER_DATE,
	IPFCGQ_TRIAL_DATE,
	IPFCGQ_SUIT_STATUS,
	IPFCGQ_SUIT_DATE,
	IPFCGQ_SUIT_TYPE,
	IPFCGQ_SUIT_REASON,
	IPFCGQ_SUIT_AMOUNT,
	IPFCGQ_COMPENSATORY_DEMAND,
	IPFCGQ_DEMAND_DATE_1,
	IPFCGQ_COMPENSATORY_OFFER,
	IPFCGQ_OFFER_DATE_1,
	IPFCGQ_PUNITIVE_DEMAND,
	IPFCGQ_DEMAND_DATE_2,
	IPFCGQ_PUNITIVE_OFFER,
	IPFCGQ_OFFER_DATE_2,
	IPFCGQ_DOCKET_NUMBER,
	IPFCGQ_SUIT_STATE_COUNTY,
	IPFCGQ_COURT,
	IPFCGQ_DATE_PAPERS_SERVED,
	IPFCGQ_NUMBER_OF_PART78,
	IPFCGQ_OFFSET_ONSET_IND,
	IPFCGQ_DATE_HIRE,
	IPFCGQ_PMS_FUTURE_USE_GQ,
	IPFCGQ_DIRECT_REPORTING,
	IPFCGQ_CUST_SPL_USE_GQ,
	IPFCGQ_YR2000_CUST_USE,
	inf_action,
	inf_timestamp,
	logical_flag,
	EXTRACT_DATE,
	AS_OF_DATE,
	RECORD_COUNT,
	SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID,
	@{pipeline().parameters.WBMI_AUDIT_CONTROL_RUN_ID} AS AUDIT_ID_OP
	FROM SQ_PIF_42GQ_LIT_stage
),
arch_PIF_42GQ_LIT_stage AS (
	INSERT INTO arch_PIF_42GQ_LIT_stage
	(pif_42gq_lit_stage_id, pif_symbol, pif_policy_number, pif_module, ipfcgq_rec_length, ipfcgq_action_code, ipfcgq_file_id, ipfcgq_segment_id, ipfcgq_segment_level_code, ipfcgq_segment_part_code, ipfcgq_sub_part_code, ipfcgq_year_of_loss, ipfcgq_month_of_loss, ipfcgq_day_of_loss, ipfcgq_loss_occurence, ipfcgq_loss_claimant, ipfcgq_claimant_use_code, ipfcgq_claimant_use_seq, ipfcgq_year_process, ipfcgq_month_process, ipfcgq_day_process, ipfcgq_year_change_entry, ipfcgq_month_change_entry, ipfcgq_day_change_entry, ipfcgq_sequence_change_entry, ipfcgq_segment_status, ipfcgq_entry_operator, ipfcgq_reservation_of_rights, ipfcgq_excess_letter, ipfcgq_suit_demand, ipfcgq_suit_offer, ipfcgq_last_offer_date, ipfcgq_trial_date, ipfcgq_suit_status, ipfcgq_suit_date, ipfcgq_suit_type, ipfcgq_suit_reason, ipfcgq_suit_amount, ipfcgq_compensatory_demand, ipfcgq_demand_date_1, ipfcgq_compensatory_offer, ipfcgq_offer_date_1, ipfcgq_punitive_demand, ipfcgq_demand_date_2, ipfcgq_punitive_offer, ipfcgq_offer_date_2, ipfcgq_docket_number, ipfcgq_suit_state_county, ipfcgq_court, ipfcgq_date_papers_served, ipfcgq_number_of_part78, ipfcgq_offset_onset_ind, ipfcgq_date_hire, ipfcgq_pms_future_use_gq, ipfcgq_direct_reporting, ipfcgq_cust_spl_use_gq, ipfcgq_yr2000_cust_use, inf_action, inf_timestamp, logical_flag, extract_date, as_of_date, record_count, source_system_id, audit_id)
	SELECT 
	PIF_42GQ_LIT_stage_id AS PIF_42GQ_LIT_STAGE_ID, 
	PIF_SYMBOL AS PIF_SYMBOL, 
	PIF_POLICY_NUMBER AS PIF_POLICY_NUMBER, 
	PIF_MODULE AS PIF_MODULE, 
	IPFCGQ_REC_LENGTH AS IPFCGQ_REC_LENGTH, 
	IPFCGQ_ACTION_CODE AS IPFCGQ_ACTION_CODE, 
	IPFCGQ_FILE_ID AS IPFCGQ_FILE_ID, 
	IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_ID AS IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_ID, 
	IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_LEVEL_CODE AS IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_LEVEL_CODE, 
	IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_PART_CODE AS IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_PART_CODE, 
	IPFCGQ_SUB_PART_CODE AS IPFCGQ_SUB_PART_CODE, 
	IPFCGQ_YEAR_OF_LOSS AS IPFCGQ_YEAR_OF_LOSS, 
	IPFCGQ_MONTH_OF_LOSS AS IPFCGQ_MONTH_OF_LOSS, 
	IPFCGQ_DAY_OF_LOSS AS IPFCGQ_DAY_OF_LOSS, 
	IPFCGQ_LOSS_OCCURENCE AS IPFCGQ_LOSS_OCCURENCE, 
	IPFCGQ_LOSS_CLAIMANT AS IPFCGQ_LOSS_CLAIMANT, 
	IPFCGQ_CLAIMANT_USE_CODE AS IPFCGQ_CLAIMANT_USE_CODE, 
	IPFCGQ_CLAIMANT_USE_SEQ AS IPFCGQ_CLAIMANT_USE_SEQ, 
	IPFCGQ_YEAR_PROCESS AS IPFCGQ_YEAR_PROCESS, 
	IPFCGQ_MONTH_PROCESS AS IPFCGQ_MONTH_PROCESS, 
	IPFCGQ_DAY_PROCESS AS IPFCGQ_DAY_PROCESS, 
	IPFCGQ_YEAR_CHANGE_ENTRY AS IPFCGQ_YEAR_CHANGE_ENTRY, 
	IPFCGQ_MONTH_CHANGE_ENTRY AS IPFCGQ_MONTH_CHANGE_ENTRY, 
	IPFCGQ_DAY_CHANGE_ENTRY AS IPFCGQ_DAY_CHANGE_ENTRY, 
	IPFCGQ_SEQUENCE_CHANGE_ENTRY AS IPFCGQ_SEQUENCE_CHANGE_ENTRY, 
	IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_STATUS AS IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_STATUS, 
	IPFCGQ_ENTRY_OPERATOR AS IPFCGQ_ENTRY_OPERATOR, 
	IPFCGQ_RESERVATION_OF_RIGHTS AS IPFCGQ_RESERVATION_OF_RIGHTS, 
	IPFCGQ_EXCESS_LETTER AS IPFCGQ_EXCESS_LETTER, 
	IPFCGQ_SUIT_DEMAND AS IPFCGQ_SUIT_DEMAND, 
	IPFCGQ_SUIT_OFFER AS IPFCGQ_SUIT_OFFER, 
	IPFCGQ_LAST_OFFER_DATE AS IPFCGQ_LAST_OFFER_DATE, 
	IPFCGQ_TRIAL_DATE AS IPFCGQ_TRIAL_DATE, 
	IPFCGQ_SUIT_STATUS AS IPFCGQ_SUIT_STATUS, 
	IPFCGQ_SUIT_DATE AS IPFCGQ_SUIT_DATE, 
	IPFCGQ_SUIT_TYPE AS IPFCGQ_SUIT_TYPE, 
	IPFCGQ_SUIT_REASON AS IPFCGQ_SUIT_REASON, 
	IPFCGQ_SUIT_AMOUNT AS IPFCGQ_SUIT_AMOUNT, 
	IPFCGQ_COMPENSATORY_DEMAND AS IPFCGQ_COMPENSATORY_DEMAND, 
	IPFCGQ_DEMAND_DATE_1 AS IPFCGQ_DEMAND_DATE_1, 
	IPFCGQ_COMPENSATORY_OFFER AS IPFCGQ_COMPENSATORY_OFFER, 
	IPFCGQ_OFFER_DATE_1 AS IPFCGQ_OFFER_DATE_1, 
	IPFCGQ_PUNITIVE_DEMAND AS IPFCGQ_PUNITIVE_DEMAND, 
	IPFCGQ_DEMAND_DATE_2 AS IPFCGQ_DEMAND_DATE_2, 
	IPFCGQ_PUNITIVE_OFFER AS IPFCGQ_PUNITIVE_OFFER, 
	IPFCGQ_OFFER_DATE_2 AS IPFCGQ_OFFER_DATE_2, 
	IPFCGQ_DOCKET_NUMBER AS IPFCGQ_DOCKET_NUMBER, 
	IPFCGQ_SUIT_STATE_COUNTY AS IPFCGQ_SUIT_STATE_COUNTY, 
	IPFCGQ_COURT AS IPFCGQ_COURT, 
	IPFCGQ_DATE_PAPERS_SERVED AS IPFCGQ_DATE_PAPERS_SERVED, 
	IPFCGQ_NUMBER_OF_PART78 AS IPFCGQ_NUMBER_OF_PART78, 
	IPFCGQ_OFFSET_ONSET_IND AS IPFCGQ_OFFSET_ONSET_IND, 
	IPFCGQ_DATE_HIRE AS IPFCGQ_DATE_HIRE, 
	IPFCGQ_PMS_FUTURE_USE_GQ AS IPFCGQ_PMS_FUTURE_USE_GQ, 
	IPFCGQ_DIRECT_REPORTING AS IPFCGQ_DIRECT_REPORTING, 
	IPFCGQ_CUST_SPL_USE_GQ AS IPFCGQ_CUST_SPL_USE_GQ, 
	IPFCGQ_YR2000_CUST_USE AS IPFCGQ_YR2000_CUST_USE, 
	INF_ACTION, 
	INF_TIMESTAMP, 
	LOGICAL_FLAG, 
	EXTRACT_DATE AS EXTRACT_DATE, 
	AS_OF_DATE AS AS_OF_DATE, 
	RECORD_COUNT AS RECORD_COUNT, 
	SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID AS SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID, 
	AUDIT_ID_OP AS AUDIT_ID
	FROM EXP_arch_PIF_42GQ_LIT_stage
),
